delete.title: Caveat
delete.content:
If you click 'Yes', the deleted record cannot be recovered.
 Are you sure you want to delete these records? ?

cancel.title: Confirmation
cancel.content: Are you sure you want to cancel this operation?

role_lv_2.title: Confirmation
role_lv_2.content: Please select the lower level implementation action at below the upper level implementation action.

role_lv_1.title: Confirmation
role_lv_1.content:
High level implementation action are lower than lowe level implementation action.
 Do you want change lower level to the same class of implementation action?

confirm_update.title: Confirmation
confirm_update.content: This action does not update the data you are entering. Do you want to run?
